name: UpdateWageSetting
description:
Creates or updates a `WageSetting` object. The object is created if a
`WageSetting` with the specified `team_member_id` does not exist. Otherwise,
it fully replaces the `WageSetting` object for the team member.
The `WageSetting` is returned on a successful update.
Learn about [Troubleshooting the Team API](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/team/troubleshooting#create-or-update-a-wage-setting).

team_member_id.description: The ID of the team member for which to update the `WageSetting` object.

body.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.

$block:
Represents a response from an update request containing the updated `WageSetting` object
or error messages.

$ul: **errors**: The errors that occurred during the request.
**wage_setting**: An object representing a team member's wage information.
**created_at**: The timestamp, in RFC 3339 format, describing when the wage setting object was created.
**is_overtime_exempt**: Whether the team member is exempt from the overtime rules of the seller's country.
**job_assignments**: Required. The ordered list of jobs that the team member is assigned to.
**team_member_id**: The unique ID of the `TeamMember` whom this wage setting describes.
**updated_at**: The timestamp, in RFC 3339 format, describing when the wage setting object was last updated.
**version**: Used for resolving concurrency issues. The request fails if the version
